title: What's the most creative use you can think of for a paper clip? - Quora

response.answer_text: Trace the end state it rests in (motionless) and along this track have points that must bridge to complete a circuit, which is to set a motion sensor alarm system in the room it resides. Fix one end to a trace (solder if need be) and straighten out the paper clip. Leave the building with ample time for the alarm system to be set.
